prompts.prompt: CompositionalPortrait, dreamy floral gaze, golden hour, cinematic close-up of a young woman (same as in image i uploaded), filtered sunlight through wildflowers casting intricate shadows on skin, soft film grain, muted violet palette, 85 mm lens, f/1.4, sharp skin texture, subtle freckles, glossy lips, delicate bokeh, zero over-processing -ar 3:4 -v 6 -style raw -no text, watermark, distortion.

The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is a 3D modeling process of this figurine. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

Apply bold hand-drawn doodles and motivational words directly on the uploaded photo. Use colors and accents that match and balance with the tones already in the photo for a seamless look. Replace the words with: [COURAGE,FOCUS,MOTIVATED] Make the doodles dynamic with handwritten typography, arrows, lightning bolts, swirls, and abstract strokes, integrated into the composition so they enhance the subject without overpowering it. The style should keep the same energetic and modern vibe as the reference.

Editorial 3* 3 photo grid in a clean cream/beige studio. Photo of character as attached image, wearing cream silk blouse, camel high-waist trousers, gold hoop earrings, minimal bracelets. Large softbox left-front, reflector right, subtle top rim. Shots to include: (1) extreme close-up of face with gold hoop earring catching light, shallow DOF (85mm, f/1.4); (2) full-body seated on modern lounge chair with a sleek laptop on lap, relaxed posture (35mm, f/5.6); (3) medium close, leaning on chair back, holding a coffee mug, eyes downward (50mm, f/2.2); (4) mid-shot adjusting wristwatch, soft smile (50mm, f/2.8); (5) tight crop of hands holding smartphone, nails visible (85mm, f/1.8); (6) 3/4 body walking past cream bike prop, looking to side (50mm, f/4); (7) black & white profile, necklace highlighted by side rim light (50-85mm, f/2.0); (8) distant full-body seated cross-legged on rug with tablet in hand (35mm, f/5.6); (9) close frontal with hands framing cheeks, soft reflective glasses catching studio light (85mm, f/1.9). Angles: mostly eye-level, occasional slight high angle for interest. Capture in RAW, moderate warm color grade, soft contrast, emphasize silk, leather, and metallic textures; shallow DOF for portraits. Mood: minimal editorial, lifestyle chic.

Create a hyper-realistic cinematic fantasy night scene. This man in the above image sits on the rooftop of a skyscraper in Charminar Street, Hyderabad city. The surrounding skyscrapers look tiny compared to his massive size. His right hand is open, palm facing upward. On his large palm, a little fairy. The atmosphere is romantic, set at midnight. Above the city skyline, a bright full moon illuminates the clear night sky. Around them, twelve tiny rainbow-colored fairies shaped like glowing hearts fly playfully, spreading blessings of love and support. Each fairy shines with a different rainbow hue, forming a magical halo around the scene. Lighting is dreamy and cinematic, blending neon city glow with soft moonlight. Ultra-detailed, 8K resolution, dramatic composition, magical and surreal yet realistic.

Ultra-realistic editorial portrait of a graceful South Asian woman with a poised, regal expression. She wears a deep brown sequinned saree with intricate mirror and thread embroidery across the fabric, subtly transitioning into maroon near the hem. The saree has sheer sleeves and densely embellished borders, worn in a classic drape with soft pleats and full arm coverage. Her blouse has a modest V-neckline. She poses in a three-quarter angle, left arm folded across her waist, right hand lifted near her chin in a contemplative pose. Her makeup is flawless and radiant—defined brows, soft contour, matte nude lipstick, and a sculpted nose. She wears large, intricately detailed traditional jhumkas with clustered pearls. Hairstyle is upgraded: voluminous twisted low bun with tendrils softly framing her face, adding allure and elegance. Background: A traditional Lippan art wall with ornate white clay motifs, mirror inlays, and earthy textures—exuding Rajasthani folk elegance. Ambient lighting is soft and diffused, with subtle golden tones highlighting her cheekbones and saree textures. Studio-quality 32k detail, 3:4 aspect ratio, no watermarks, no overlays, crisp color grading, cinematic editorial finish. Expression: poised, confident, timeless.
